body_html:
Again, neither us nor bazel does not have official support for RedHat. So we do not have extensive experience with different error modes that you can see. Not sure why this is happening, so Ill mark this as Community support to see if anyone from the community has any information on building on RedHat.

You can also look through our previous issues. there seems to be a handful of people who ran into similar issues before:
#3841
#3431
#4851
#5182
bazelbuild/bazel#1317
#1157

body:
Again, neither us nor bazel does not have official support for RedHat. So we do not have extensive experience with different error modes that you can see. Not sure why this is happening, so Ill mark this as Community support to see if anyone from the community has any information on building on RedHat.

You can also look through our previous issues. there seems to be a handful of people who ran into similar issues before:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3841
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3431
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/4851
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/5182
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/1317
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1157
